page.description: Create a UX Component that can be used to test changes to a mobile app without needing to republish the application after every change.

section.description: The PhoneGap Shell allows you to easily and quickly test UX components without having to go through the time-consuming process of building and deploying your mobile application.
Once you have installed the PhoneGap Shell on your device, all you need to do to test a UX Component running under PhoneGap si:

step.description: Publish the UX Component to your server
Add the component name to the List on the Home page of the PhoneGap shell
Tap on the row in the List to dynamicaly load your UX component into the PhoneGap shell.

section.note: You *[must]* fill in the correct value for the *[URL for Ajax Callbacks]* property in the PhoneGap Build Genie when you build your project using this component.
